name: Memory One Piece
description:
You can play this memory game either solo or duo. 

There are 3 difficulties (each difficulty increase the number of cards) : 

- Easy

- Medium

- Hard

It is a memory game about One Piece universe !

You can also play the game here : https://icepick4.github.io/Memory-One-Piece/public/

Do not hesitate to star the GitHub repo if you liked the game ;)

Repo : https://github.com/icepick4/Memory-One-Piece
